subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When Mets closer Billy Wagner drives Tom Glavine to work, he lets Glavine select the radio station. Normally a driver gets to choose, but Wagner defers to Glavine’s seniority. Glavine is 40 years old; Wagner is a mere 35.
snippet: When Mets closer Billy Wagner drives Tom Glavine to work, he lets Glavine select the radio station. Normally a driver gets to choose, but Wagner defers to Glavine’s seniority. Glavine is 40 years old; Wagner is a mere 35.
